item.description:
game starts @ 4:15 -

all sorts of snacks along with a cash bar - rsvp required by Wednesday 10/12.

Cost: $10.00 for paid up members / $12.00 for unpaid members

We may have room for guests (one per member) first come/first serve based on room capacity of 45 people.

If you're still hungry at halftime you can order off the menu - average price of sandwiches is $9.95 - http://www.mickmorgans.com/newsite
item.how_to_find_us: function room right off restaurant entrance
item.name: watch the Patriots beat the Cowboys!!
